reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The project aims at 1) identifying through studies potential candidates to become micro-entrepreneurs in the field of special interests tourism in Central Chile and 2) to capacitate them. The beneficiaries represent the indigenous mapuche community of the Tolten municipality which is committed in the project along other government-linked institutions that can support the beneficiaries once the project ends through their instruments. There will be two courses of capacitation for a target group of 15 micro-e ntrepreneurs. The project is implemented by the faculty of economics, Universidad de Chile.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland
